pullrequest.title: Add support for copying & pasting nested models in model editor

content.raw:
Copying from the context menu seems to be broken for nested models:

1. Select a link

1. Right-click a nested model (it doesn't get selected, but the context menu is right, delete works)

2.  Choose Copy

1. When you paste, it will be the link

Another scenario:

1. Click on the ground plane so nothing is selected

1. Right click a nested model - Copy is disabled
content.html:
Copying from the context menu seems to be broken for nested models:

  1. Select a link

  2. Right-click a nested model (it doesn't get selected, but the context menu is right, delete works)

  3. Choose Copy

  4. When you paste, it will be the link

Another scenario:

  1. Click on the ground plane so nothing is selected

  2. Right click a nested model - Copy is disabled
